product.description: APIs essential to maintaining pertinent data about accountholders, including which parties are related to which accounts and the nature of those relationships.
product.longDescription:
APIs essential to maintaining pertinent data about accountholders, including which parties are related to which accounts and the nature of those relationships.

  • Account lists
  • Party-to-account relationships
  • Party-to-party relationships
